DOC.brief_summary: The purpose Registry collect data Implantable Cardioverter Defibrillator ( ICD ) therapies medication use physician treat ventricular arrhythmia order well understand improve clinical care patient effectiveness ICD therapy .
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year age old . Patients legal guardian willing able sign Permission Access Use Health Information Registry Form , require Institution 's IRB , Informed Consent . New replacement implant Medtronic market release single , dual triple chamber ICDs include : GEM VR , GEM DR , GEM III AT , Marquis VR , Marquis DR , Maximo DR , Maximo VR , InSync ICD , InSync Marquis ICD InSync II Marquis ICD . Patients enrol device study effect program treatment .
